text: Harbor Lights is a 1963 American film directed by Maury Dexter. It was shot in San Juan, Puerto Rico. ==Cast== *Kent Taylor as Dan Crown *Míriam Colón as Gina Rosario *Jeff Morrow as Cardinal ==Production== It was the first of a two-picture deal between Míriam Colón and Robert L. Lippert. ==References== ==External links== * * *Review of film at New York Times *Harbor Lights at BFI Category:1963 films Category:Films directed by Maury Dexter Category:American films Category:American action films Category:English-language films Category:20th Century Fox films
title: Harbor Lights (1963 film)
